title: 'I'm not having it': Harvey Proctor storms out of BBC interview on 'VIP sex ring' scandal
text:
A former Conservative MP, wrongly accused of being a member of a 'VIP pedophile ring', walked out of a BBC interview this morning.

Harvey Proctor was being interviewed by journalist Naga Munchetty after he was falsely accused of being involved in two murders and multiple counts of abuse in the 1970s and 1980s.

He said during the BBC interview: “I have been under the cosh, or truncheon, of the Metropolitan Police for nearly five years now. It is harrowing to be investigated or the centre of such an investigation for so long.

“I lost my job, my home and my reputation as a result of a fantasist.”

Ms Munchetty said she had to offer the Met Police a right of reply.
description: A former Conservative MP, wrongly accused of being a member of a 'VIP pedophile ring', walked out of a BBC interview this morning.
